title: 2012 Wired Cover - secondary font
content:
![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125139im_/http:/typophile.com/files/GetAGrip_3532.jpg)

Anyone have any ideas - it is obviously similar to courier, but a bit sleeker. It's wider, has ball serifs and some egyptienne traits (g, a, etc)

I feel like i've seen it, but can't place my finger on it. The AD on the project is asking for an exact match. I've spent many hours coming...close - so bear in mind it needs to be really, really close/exact.

Thanks!

Font: 

 Klim Medium 

Solved By: 

 [fvilanakis](http://web.archive.org/web/20150317125139/http:/typophile.com/user/176276 "View user profile.")
author: vfleigh

comments.content: That is absolutely it. I knew there was going to be one foundry I skipped. Of course it was village. thank you so much!
